douche noun [C]
(WASH)
a liquid, usually water, that is put into the vagina in order to wash it or treat it medically: a cold douche
More examplesFewer examplesToday doctors say frequent use of douches can cause infections and other problems. Be wary of things like douches and scented gels that can be irritating.

douche noun [C]
(INSULT)
US very informal an unpleasant person: You'd be a douche if you did that. Synonym
douchebag
More examplesFewer examplesMan you really are a douche! What makes you think you can use your phone on a plane?A douche is a douche, however much money he has.You're afraid to admit you like it because then your friends would think you are a douche.Life is too short to be a douche over something like that.
